[Desc]               <pink>Your name is Janice Mercer, and you don't know how you got here. After a brutally hard day at work, at home, and at court, you signed some papers in a split decision and now you're a contestant in some tacky gameshow. It's not like you to sign a paper without looking at it, but you've had a rough day.

Whatever your reasons for joining, you have already decided that you are too good for this. CEO of BoviCo, worth upwards of five million, two eulogies to your name. You shouldn't be here. You should be at home, at your desk, listening to James Taylor while you work out the divorce. But here you are. Might as well make these next few hours count.</pink>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>It's over. Finally. The host is sayin' his goodbyes and congratulations, and you don't wanna be rude, but you have a lil' situation down below. You make your way to your farm and get back to doin' what you might've always been doin': milkin', workin', and fuckin'. As word gets out on your unusually tasty milk, customers come out in droves, which of course means more work for your tits, and you wouldn't have it any other way. You don't care that your customers come back with glassy eyes and swollen breasts. You're livin' an honest, farmer's life, and you're lovin' every second!</pink>;
